title: Cobalt
technologies: DraftJS, form validation/control, hooks, React/Redux, RESTful Apis
description: The idea development platform! Built the 'Develop Idea' section: Save user's data to the DB, enable them to retrieve/update data any time to streamline the user experience. Pull in saved user data to populate 'Project Details' with proper project information: allow the user to access project details for editing. Create a responsive sidebar and notifications for an intuitive and optimized navigation. Added DraftJs to all form inputs that allows the user to enter rich text. Ensured newly created projects' design match general website design for a harmonious UI. React app using Redux, hooks, form validation/control, Routes, RESTful Apis, CSS.

title: Happy Cloud
description: Track your daily gratitude and reflect on past gratefulness. Enter your daily appreciation, generate your personalized word cloud and share it to spread the positivity!

title: Team Profile Generator
description: This app takes information about employees and generates an HTML webpage that displays summaries for each person.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: Get the current weather conditions and a 5 day forecast for any city you search for!
